Aircash is multi-currency virtual cash Wallet and the issuer of the Aircash card. Funds are deposited on the Aircash Wallet in cash or by Visa, Maestro, Mastercard, Diners, Discover and JCB credit/debit cards. Money can be withdrawn instantly in cash at ATMs, at the Aircash partner’s point of sales as well as to any Croatian bank account. It allows users to send money to family and friends, buy and sell foreign currencies, buy tickets for buses, ferries and catamarans, buy tickets for sport and other events as well as pay utility bills, parking, tolls, buy vouchers, games, lottery tickets and similar.

AIRCASH CARD
The Aircash card can be bought at all partner points of sale and used at more than 30 million locations worldwide: online, in stores, at ATMs... The card is managed within the Aircash wallet which can always be topped up with cash, card payments and receipt of funds on Aircash.

DEPOSIT
Money can be deposited in cash onto the Aircash wallet at any Aircash partner’s point of sale or by Visa, Maestro, Mastercard, Diners, Discover and JCB credit and debit cards, instantly and without any fees.

TRANSFER
Money can be transferred from the Aircash wallet in any currency and from any country in the world to friends or family in just a few clicks in a quick and secure way. Money is immediately available to the recipient.

MARKETPLACE
Aircash wallet can also be used to buy tickets for buses, ferries and catamarans, buy tickets for sport and other events as well as to conveniently exchange foreign currency, pay utility bills, parking, tolls, buy PlayStation vouchers, games, lottery tickets and to top-up online user and telecom accounts at the Aircash partner in just a few seconds.

WITHDRAWAL
Money from the Wallet can be withdrawn instantly in cash at any PBZ ATM, on Aircash partner's point of sales at thousands of locations across Croatia as well as to any Croatian bank account.

LOCATIONS
Aircash partner’s points of sale where cash deposits or withdrawals can be made at any time of the day are currently all Tisak and iNovine news stands as well as Ina and Tifon gas stations in Croatia. Alongside the aforementioned locations, withdrawal is also possible at any PBZ ATMs across Croatia.

Bez obzira na to gdje se nalazili, m-zabom možete:

m-zabu možete ugovoriti putem e-zabe ili u poslovnici Banke. Ostale usluge, kao što su pregled lokacija bankomata i poslovnica te tečajna lista, dostupne su svima, bez potrebe ugovaranja. 

SIGURNOST

Zagrebačka banka posvećuje posebnu pozornost sigurnosti korisnika mobilnog bankarstva. 

•	PIN kojim se pristupa poznat je samo korisniku, stoga u slučaju krađe ili gubitka mobitela ne može doći do zlouporabe.

No matter where you are, with m-zaba you can:

•	Check balance and transactions of your accounts, saving accounts and loans.

•	Pay your bills by scanning via the m-photo pay or the fast scan services.

You can arrange m-zaba via e-zaba or in our branches. 
Other services, such as the ATM locator and exchange rates, are available to everybody, without arranging. 

SAFETY

Zagrebačka Banka pays special attention to the security of operations performed by mobile banking clients. 
•	PIN used to access the services is only known by the user and therefore there is no threat of abuse if a mobile device is stolen or lost.

KEKS Pay je zabavna i jednostavna aplikacija za brzo i sigurno slanje i primanje novca – i to bez ikakvih naknada! Duguješ nekome za ručak? Netko tebi duguje za karte za kino? Besplatno skini KEKS Pay i olakšaj si život. Uživaj u slatkim transakcijama već danas!

Svi su dobrodošli
Iako je KEKS Pay aplikacija Erste banke, možeš je koristiti neovisno o tome u kojoj banci ti ili tvoji frendovi imate račun bez da pritom plaćaš ikakve naknade za prijenos novca.

Stvarno brzo i jednostavno
Skini i instaliraj aplikaciju u svega 2 minute, a onda šalji ili zatraži lovu od frendova. Podatke za primanje i slanje love trebaš upisati samo jednom, a od frenda nijednom. Da bi mu poslao lovu, dovoljno je da imaš njegov broj mobitela. Da, dobro si shvatio - nema više zamornog upisivanja dugačkih brojeva i šifri!

Podijeli troškove
Želiš s frendovima skupiti lovu za rođendanski poklon, ali ne želiš voditi evidenciju plaćanja i boriti se s gotovinom? KEKS Pay je pravo rješenje za tebe! Više ne moraš brinuti jesu li svi platili i vući lovu naokolo. Kreiraj chat grupu, pozovi ekipu da se sve lijepo dogovorite i jednostavno prati uplate putem mobitela.

Pozovi frenda
Lovu možeš poslati i nekome tko nema KEKS Pay. On će dobiti SMS s uputama za preuzimanje aplikacije, a potom i tvoje uplate, u samo nekoliko klikova. Baš kao što si ti već učinio, i on će upisati IBAN na koji želi primati uplate. U slučaju da ne preuzme aplikaciju u roku od 5 dana, tebi će lova biti pošteno vraćena.

Sigurnost prije svega
Što se tiče sigurnosti, tu nemaš nikakvog razloga za brigu - brojevi kartica nisu zapisani na mobitelu, sve je kriptirano i spremljeno na zaštićenim serverima do kojih nitko ne može doći (u skladu s regulativom PCI DSS), a aplikacija je zaštićena PIN-om ili biometrijom (otisak prsta i ostale opcije). Kao što vidš, Erste banka misli na sve.

POBA m_Token je aplikacija koja se instalira i koristi  putem mobilnog uređaja, a služi za identifikaciju korisnika i potvrdu izvršavanja transakcija putem POBAklik internetskog bankarstva. Budući da se aplikacija nalazi na vašem mobilnom uređaju odlikuje ju praktičnost, jednostavnost i dostupnost za korištenje. 

UGOVARANJE I INSTALACIJA 

Uslugu POBA m_Token možete ugovoriti u bilo kojoj poslovnici Podravske banke. Po ugovaranju usluge na vaš mobilni uređaj zaprimit ćete dvije SMS poruke. U prvoj poruci nalazi se link s kojeg možete skinuti m_Token aplikaciju, dok je u drugoj ključ za personaliziranje POBA m_Token aplikacije. 

Nakon uspješne personalizacije m_Token aplikacije bit će vam ponuđena opcija za unos i potvrdu PIN-a koji ćete ubuduće koristiti za ulazak u POBA m_Token.

Pristup internetu je potreban samo kod preuzimanja aplikacije, personalizacije (prvog pokretanja aplikacije) te kod promjene PIN-a. Nakon preuzimanja i personalizacije POBA m_Tokena pristup internetu nije potreban.
VAŽNO O SIGURNOSTI

Razina sigurnosti POBA m_Tokena je ista kao i kod fizičkog tokena (Display kartice) i ulaz u aplikaciju je zaštićen PIN-om koji je poznat samo vlasniku. PIN kojim pristupate POBA m_Tokenu možete u bilo kojem trenutku promijeniti. Ukoliko je m_Token aplikacija neaktivna više od 2 minute, automatski se gasi.

----------

POBA m_Token is an application, installed and used on a cell phone, for user identification and e-banking payment confirmation (POBAklik e-banking). Since the application is on your cell phone, it provides a simple, practical, easy-to-access use.

AGREEMENT & INSTALLATION

POBA m_Token application can be agreed at any of Podravska bank branches. After you’ve agreed to use it,  your cell phone receives 2 SMS messages: the first provides a link where to download m_Token application, the second text message provides a password for POBA m_Token personalization.

After a successful personalization, m_Token requires PIN entry and PIN confirmation, also needed for future login to POBA m_Token.

Internet access is only needed for the initial download, application personalization and PIN change. 
Once after POBA m_Token is personalized, Internet access is no longer needed.

SECURITY

POBA m_Token security level is the same as for a physical token (Display card); application entry is protected with PIN, known to its owner exclusively. PIN used for POBA m_Token access can be changed at any time.  If m_Token is inactive for more than 2 minutes, it automatically shuts down.

Jedinstveni zaslon za unos naloga još više olakšava plaćanja i prijenos sredstava. Opcija Slikaj i plati, s kojom je ručno popunjavanje naloga postalo prošlost, sad vam je nadohvat prsta, a umjesto internim prijenosom sva kunska plaćanja zadajete na jednom zaslonu.

Sigurnu prijavu u usluge e-bankarstva omogućuje mToken - jednostavna opcija unutar mBankinga koja unosom 4-znamenkastog mPIN-a daje kontrolu nad vlastitim transakcijama. mToken je besplatan, a za njegovo je korištenje potrebno imati ugovorenu uslugu NetBanking ili FonBanking te potom preuzeti mBanking aplikaciju.
 
Osim navedenoga, Erste mBanking omogućuje:

You can upload invoices from the gallery or scan parts of the invoice, review and sign orders for national payment files, and order statements and invoices for their business accounts with significantly lower fees.

Erste Bank's secure e-banking services are accessible via mToken, a simple option  within the mBanking app that lets you control all your financial transactions via a  4-digit mPIN. As a NetBanking or FonBanking user, you can download the free mBanking app and start using the mToken option.

In addition to the above, Erste mBanking allows:

Minimal version requirement: iOS 12.
 
The Touch ID feature is available on iPhone 5s or later.

HOW TO BECOME A USER 

Private individuals who are already users of electronic banking provided by Raiffeisen banka can activate the app on their mobile phone using only a username and password.

Small enterprises and entrepreneurs can become users by submitting a request for using mobile and telephone banking in any branch office of Raiffeisen banka a.d. Beograd.

Aplikacija je razvijena u sklopu projekta „Povezivanje i unaprjeđenje aplikativnih rješenja unutar Informacijskog sustava Porezne uprave i razvoj mPorezne“ sufinanciranog od Europske unije iz Europskog socijalnog fonda.

Porezni obveznici koji su korisnici mobilnih uređaja mogu kroz mobilnu aplikaciju ostvariti uvid u svoje podatke, zaprimljene poruke i porezne akte, mogu podnositi zahtjeve, dobiti važne informacije o svojim poreznim obvezama i poslati upit Poreznoj upravi koji se tiče sustava ePorezna i mPorezna.

Porezni obveznici putem aplikacije mogu vidjeti i stanje na porezno knjigovodstvenoj kartici (PKK), preuzeti 2D barkod za provođenje plaćanja, pregledati detalje podnesenih obrazaca i zahtjeva, provjeriti obavijesti i rokove podnošenja obrazaca kroz personalizirani porezni kalendar, mogu podnijeti zahtjev za izmjenom podataka na poreznoj kartici (PK), zahtjev za izdavanje potvrde o stanju duga, zahtjev za izmjenom podataka u Registru poreznih obveznika, informativno izračunati podatke o plaći putem usluge kalkulatora za izračun plaće, direktno se obratiti Poreznoj upravi putem servisa „Pišite nam“ te anonimno prijaviti porezni i drugi prekršaj.

Također, poreznim obveznicima omogućen je  uvid u podatke iz JOPPD obrasca (Izvješće o primicima, porezu na dohodak i prirezu te doprinosima za obvezna osiguranja) za korisnika usluge, Uvid u IP1/IP2 - uvid u podatke o plaći, mirovini, doprinosima, porezu i prirezu koji ulaze u godišnji obračun (obračunati i isplaćeni primici) i Uvid u IP3 - uvid u podatke o plaći, mirovini, doprinosima, porezu i prirezu koji ne ulaze u godišnji obračun.

Funkcionalnosti su prilagođene radu na manjim ekranima kako bi iskustvo korištenja bilo optimalno uz mogućnost podešavanja veličine slova i boje ekrana. Za korištenje aplikacije potrebno se prijaviti putem Nacionalnog identifikacijskog i autentifikacijskog sustava (NIAS) koristeći jednu od priznatih vjerodajnica NIAS sustava. Za prijavu u aplikaciju potrebno je posjedovati valjanu NIAS vjerodajnicu značajne ili niske razine sigurnosti: značajna razina sigurnosti uključuje na primjer mToken, Fina Soft certifikat, token/mtoken uređaje banaka koji su povezani sa sustavom NIAS dok niska razina sigurnosti uključuje ePass, ePošta, AAI@EduHr korisničko ime i lozinku, HT Telekom ID.

Strateški cilj Porezne uprave je dvostrana elektronička komunikacija Porezne uprave i poreznih obveznika, stoga je uspostava elektroničkih usluga na mobilnim platformama značajan korak u širenju kruga korisnika i proširenja dostupnosti elektroničkih usluga Porezne uprave poreznim obveznicima. U sklopu ovog projekta razvijene su nove funkcionalnosti sustava ePorezna kroz uspostavu krovne mobilne aplikacije mPorezna unutar koje će se kroz funkcije mobilnih aplikacija omogućiti povećanje dostupnosti elektroničkih usluga Porezne uprave građanima i poduzetnicima.

Sadržaj mobilne aplikacije isključiva je odgovornost Ministarstva financija – Porezne uprave, a razvijena je od tvrtke APIS IT d.o.o.

SELF-CUSTODIAL

Your cryptoassets are ultra-secure because only you can access them. Self-custodial means not even Bitcoin.com has access to your funds, and you can easily port your assets to another crypto wallet whenever you want. No lock-ins, and you'll never again ask for permission to use *your* money.

DEFI READY

Connect to Ethereum and Avalanche DApps via WalletConnect. That means you can earn interest on your crypto, trade using decentralized exchanges, participate in NFT marketplaces, access lending markets and much, much more.

QUICK & SECURE ACCESS

Unlock your Wallet app with biometrics or PIN.

AUTOMATED BACKUP

Conveniently back up all your wallets to the cloud and decrypt them with a single master password. Replace the hassle of managing numerous secret phrases with the convenience and security of a single custom password. (You can still opt to manually manage your individual seed phrases).

CUSTOMIZABLE FEES

You decide the network fee. Up the fee for faster network confirmations. Lower it when you're not in a rush. Bitcoin.com takes ZERO fees (you pay only to use the public blockchain networks).

LOW-FEE CHAINS

MARKETS VIEW
Track the price action and get key info on the top cryptocurrencies.

PERSONAL NOTES

Add text to your transactions to remind you who sent what, when, and where.

Aplikacija PBZmToken također služi za autentifikaciju korisnika kartica pri internetskoj kupnji korištenjem 3D Secure sigurnosnog standarda te ostalih usluga za koje PBZ dopušta korištenje aplikacije u svrhu autentifikacije i autorizacije korisnika. 

Nakon instalacije aplikacije PBZmToken aplikaciju je potrebno aktivirati unosom identifikacijskog i aktivacijskog koda koje korisniku dodjeljuje PBZ u poslovnicama Banke ili putem usluge PBZ365@NET. Nakon unosa identifikacijskog i aktivacijskog koda korisnik sam određuje PIN za daljnje korištenje aplikacije, pri čemu se kreira PIN asocijacija koja se sastoji od naziva države i prikaza njezine zastave. SIGURNOST
Korištenje aplikacije PBZmToken potpuno je sigurno, što je potvrđeno i certifikatom za sigurnost ISO 27001:2005. PBZmToken pokreće se PIN-om koji je poznat samo korisniku. PIN se ne pohranjuje na mobilni uređaj, čime se osigurava tajnost podataka o PIN-u.

• Manage any number of online accounts - from savings banks and banks
• Set up transfers and standing orders quickly
• Know all about account transactions with the account alarm clock
• Find the shortest route to the nearest ATM or branch

The app Sparkasse will be there for you in all situations. No matter whether you set up a standing order while traveling on train, settle your bill at the breakfast table with photo transfer or check the account balance and credit card transactions. Annoying filling out a transfer form on the computer is no longer necessary. Instead, you can easily do everything with the iPhone/iPad.

ACCOUNT ALARM CLOCK
The account alarm clock informs you promptly about account transactions. If you want to know the accounts  daily basis, set up the account balance alarm clock. The salary alarm clock tells you when wages are received and the limit alarm clock lets you know when an account balance is exceeded or undercut.

GIROPAY | KWITT
A cozy evening with friends at your favorite restaurant is something nice. And sharing the bill is easy. With giropay | Kwitt you’ll send money from cell phone to cell phone without delay. This is also possible if you borrow money or collect money for a gift.

APPLE PAY
If you want to use Apple Pay, the app Sparkasse is a prerequisite. Activate your digital cards for the Wallet app.

HIGH SECURITY
If you use a high-quality, up-to-date banking app in combination with an up-to-date operating system and a secure internet connection, you don't have to worry about mobile banking. The app Sparkasse communicates via tested interfaces and ensures secure data transfer in accordance with the German requirements for online banking. All data is stored encrypted. Access is protected by a password and optionally by Touch ID/Face ID. The autolock function locks the app automatically. All finances are secured to the maximum in the event of loss. TÜV confirms the safety standards and re-tests them annually.

OTHER HANDY FEATURES
Use the search function across accounts and bank details, set up a budget book (offline account) for budget planning and view graphical evaluations of your finances. You have a direct line to your Sparkasse via app and access to many services such as card blocking, notifications, notepads, appointments and even the account opening via app (if offered by your Sparkasse). On top, you can switch directly to the app S-Invest and place securities.

PRECONDITIONS
You need an account with a German Sparkasse or Bank that has been activated for online banking (HBCI with PIN/TAN or FinTS with PIN/TAN). TAN methods supported for payment transactions are chipTAN manual, chipTAN QR, chipTAN comfort (optical), pushTAN; smsTAN.

HINTS
Please send support requests directly from the app. Please note that individual functions incur costs at your institute, which may be passed on to you. giropay | Kwitt is at your disposal if it is supported by your Sparkasse or Bank.
